subject: Crypto News. July 12, 2025
body:
View this post on the web at https://www.cryptointegrat.com/p/crypto-news-july-12-2025

Vare Crypto News is live ft Oasys, Gates Inc, Jerome Powell, ETH Strategy, BTC Digital, Pumpfun
Live on YouTube:
https://youtube.com/shorts/FSex0u9FWR0 [ https://substack.com/redirect/397d089b-8f91-429d-a735-c6e078f21341?j=eyJ1IjoiNXZxdTAzIn0.8gObup55391UiysY1BATCN5wRc6MUJZaZgak5YGfZYw ]
Live on TikTok:
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMSs86Xqn/ [ https://substack.com/redirect/5367cae5-7d04-42a2-8244-5e29cc4eca18?j=eyJ1IjoiNXZxdTAzIn0.8gObup55391UiysY1BATCN5wRc6MUJZaZgak5YGfZYw ]
Please subscribe.
DeFi
Pump.fun raised $600M in 12 minutes, selling 15% of its 1 trillion PUMP token supply at $0.004 each
Nasdaq listed BTC mining firm, BTC Digital announced a $1M Ethereum reserve. This move is part of their broader plan to expand into ETH onchain including DeFi, stablecoins, and asset tokenization.
Autonomous protocol, ETH Strategy acquired 6,900 ETH as it pushes to become the largest onchain ETH treasury.
Presale backers include Ethereum OGs, DAOs, and onchain funds who committed ETH at 1 ETH for 10,000 STRAT.
The funds will seed their treasury, bootstrap launch liquidity, and kick off a convertible note program.
Their mission: Build the largest ETH treasury, Grow ETH per STRAT (EPS), Launch a new onchain volatility trade
GATES Inc is bringing $75M worth of Tokyo real estate on-chain using Oasys blockchain, with plans to scale that to over $200B, that’s about 1% of Japan’s property market. This is a huge move for both sides: GATES is a serious player with $145M in revenue and prepping for a NASDAQ listing, and choosing Oasys shows real confidence in the chain’s ability to handle real-world asset tokenization at scale. Oasys, OAS started as a gaming chain is now stepping into RWA space starting with Gates Inc
Rumors of Jerome Powell resigning. If so, Trump puts in his new figure, this gets him easy cuts, more inflation, $ looses value and BTC pumps

Unsubscribe https://substack..eL7DYa9BgSjpDmLCmofWooW7kaQQjKT98qqEKHHPpks?
